      • changeQuantity

        public void changeQuantity(Item item,
                           int amount,
                           org.salespointframework.order.Cart cart)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        changes quantity of a CartItem by +- 1
        Parameters:
        item - Item in the changed CartItem
        amount - amount the quantity is altered by
        cart - the Cart in which the CartItem is saved
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the Item is null

      • createPizzaOrder

        public void createPizzaOrder(boolean cutlery,
                             boolean onSite,
                             org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount userAccount,
                             org.salespointframework.order.Cart cart,
                             Customer customer,
                             java.lang.String remark)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        creates PizzaOrder from the contents of the Cart
        Parameters:
        cutlery - boolean: is a cutlery being lent?
        onSite - boolean: is the order picked up by the customer?
        userAccount - currently logged in UserAccount
        cart - the Cart from which the PizzaOrder is created
        customer - Customer behind the order
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if either userAccount or customer are null; if cart is empty
